_meanings:
{@--2@} The destruction of the whole
universe (at the end of a {%kalpa%}),
universal destruction; <ls>Ku. 2. 8</ls>;
<ls>Bg. 7. 6.</ls>

{@--6@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Loss of 
consciousness, considered as one of the 33
subordinate feelings; {#pralayaH#} 
{#suKaduHKAdyErgAQamiMdriyamUrCanaM#} <ls>Pratāparudra</ls>.

a cloud at the
dissolution of the world.

the
fire at the dissolution of the world.

the ocean at the 
dissolution of the world.
